model

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Model

  • public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    This class models the data from the database and stores them into HashMaps. This class is modeled after the Singleton pattern as it is better to only have a single instance of the data from the database.
    Author:
    msta & tbrj

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Model getInstance(Nexus n)
        Returns the model. This method ensures that the model is a singleton. It only creates a new Model if the model does NOT already exist.
        Parameters:
        n; - Nexus object
        Returns:
        Model object

      • add

        public void add(int id,
       java.lang.Object o)
        Adds an object to a HashMap. Uses the instanceOf statement to determine which HashMap to add the object to.
        Parameters:
        id; - int
        o; - Object

      • delete

        public java.lang.Object delete(int id,

        o; - Object
